effect.black-white: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.
effect.black-2-white-2: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.

short_effect.black-white: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.
short_effect.black-2-white-2: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.

flavor_text.black-white: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to the target, harshly reducing its Speed stat.
